name: Shift Into Turbo Quiz | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Having broken his back during "Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie" Rocky was replaced on the team. Who was the new Ranger?
questions.explanation:
Justin.

	Justin, played by Blake Foster, was the first child Ranger to be seen in the franchise. When he morphed he was turned into an adult size. He was the blue Ranger.

questions.text: Zordon and Alpha 5 left the franchise during this arc. Who replaced Zordon in the Command Center?
questions.explanation:
Dimitria.

	Dimitria is the only non-evil character. Divatox was the villain for the season. Zordon and Alpha 5 left to return to Eltar, so Dimitria and Alpha 6 replaced them. Dimitria served in the exact same capacity as Zordon, giving the Rangers advice and helping them find ways to defeat monsters.

questions.text: Four of the Rangers were preparing for graduation, while which other Ranger had already graduated?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Tommy had already graduated from Angel Grove High School in the pilot. Adam, Rocky (no longer a ranger) Kat and Tanya were all prepping for graduation and Justin was preparing to start high school. Tommy was working for his uncle at a race shop as both a mechanic and a race car driver.

questions.text: What does the season's main villain call the army of minions that serve her?
questions.explanation:
Piranhatrons.

	Divatox lives in a submarine that can travel the cosmos, so her army of pawns are called piranhatrons. The cogs served the Machine Empire in the "Zeo" season. The putty and tengu served Rita Repulsa and Lord Zedd in "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers".

questions.text: Team leader Tommy served as the green Ranger in this season.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Tommy was the red Turbo Ranger for the first half of the season before he left the series for several years. Previously he had been the red "Zeo" Ranger and both the green and white "Mighty Morphin" Ranger.

questions.text: Former thugs Bulk and Skull took jobs teaching at Angel Grove High School this season.
questions.explanation:
False.

	While the two continued to work on bettering themselves, they were still in high school at the beginning of the season. They graduated with the Rangers, while maintaining their positions with the Junior Police Patrol. They were later turned into chimpanzees for several episodes when a monster attacked them.

questions.text: How was Elgar related to Divatox?
questions.explanation:
Nephew.

	THough Divatox was a human and Elgar was a monster, he repeatedly called her "aunty". It wasn't explained in this episode if the familial relation was through a brother or a sister though. Later in the season it was revealed that Elgar was her sister's son.

questions.text: Who was the first Ranger shown going through the morphing sequence? (Not in a flashback to "Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie".)
questions.explanation:
Justin.

	Justin was fighting Elgar at the Angel Grove Power Center while the others (Adam, Kat and Tanya) were at their graduation. Tommy was still out of town working with his uncle. Justin, the newest team member, was the first to be seen morphing, followed by Tanya, Kat and Adam in that order.

questions.text: Who was the police officer who was in charge of the Junior Police Patrol?
questions.explanation:
Lt. Stone

	Lt. Jerome Stone was the police liaison to the Junior Police Patrol the entire time that Bulk and Skull were members. He only appeared briefly in this episode arc, assigning the duo to guard the power plant.

questions.text: What were the Turbo Zords in the shape of?
questions.explanation:
Vehicles.

	Every time the Rangers get new powers, they also get new Zords. The Zords are often designed to look like whatever theme the powers match up to that season. Turbo, being an automotive term, and the morphing call being "Shift Into Turbo" it only made sense to have the Zords be powerful versions of various automobiles, that could transform into one huge Megazord when needed.
